snippet.title: Might & Magic: Elemental Guardians: Release Date Announcement | Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
snippet.description:
Register now to this fast-paced RPG and get your special reward!
 Apple Store: http://bit.ly/mmegpr-ytum 
 Google Play: http://bit.ly/mmeg-pr-gp-yt 
 
 Enter the world of Might & Magic: Elemental Guardians - a fast-paced strategy RPG based on the medieval fantasy realm of Might & Magic.
 Journey through enchanted lands, collecting fierce and fantastic elemental creatures, and evolve a team of mighty warriors to summon to battle on the path to victory.
 
 #ElementalGuardians #MightandMagic
 #MightandMagicElementalGuardians #MightandMagicMobile
 
 Learn more at https://www.mightandmagic.com/. Available May 31, 2018.
 
 Please SUBSCRIBE and visit our official channels for exclusive access and the latest information on all things Might & Magic: Elemental Guardians.
 
 https://www.facebook.com/MightAndMagicEG/
 https://twitter.com/mightandmagiceg
 https://www.instagram.com/mightandmagiceg/
 https://discord.gg/jq6pHV3
 
 Might & Magic: Elemental Guardians: Release Date Announcement | Trailer | Ubisoft [NA] 
 https://www.youtube.com/UbisoftNA
